vp.title: Content Width
vp.tooltip: Set a minimum content width (1st field) and maximum content width (2nd field).

option-boxed-layout.title: Boxed Layout
option-boxed-layout.tooltip: Enable a boxed layout for your website.

body-bg-color.title: Website Background Color
body-bg-color.tooltip: Set the default background color for your website (ACSS variable recommended).

action.title: Action
action.tooltip: The action color of your website (used for buttons & links).

action-shades.title: Edit Action Shades
action-shades.description: Adjust each shade’s HSL values. Higher values provide more saturation/lightness and lower values provide less. Don't adjust the hue unless you know exactly what you're doing.

action-hover.title: Hover
action-hover.tooltip: Set hover lightness as a multiple (e.g. "1.15" for 15% lighter)

primary.title: Primary
primary.tooltip: The most used color of your website.

primary-shades.title: Edit Primary Shades
primary-shades.description: Adjust each shade’s HSL values. Higher values provide more saturation/lightness and lower values provide less. Don't adjust the hue unless you know exactly what you're doing.

primary-hover.title: Hover
primary-hover.tooltip: Set hover lightness as a multiple (e.g. "1.15" for 15% lighter)

secondary.title: Secondary
secondary.tooltip: An alternate to the primary color.

secondary-shades.title: Edit Secondary Shades
secondary-shades.description: Adjust each shade’s HSL values. Higher values provide more saturation/lightness and lower values provide less. Don't adjust the hue unless you know exactly what you're doing.

secondary-hover.title: Hover
secondary-hover.tooltip: Set hover lightness as a multiple (e.g. "1.15" for 15% lighter)

accent.title: Accent
accent.tooltip: Typically the least used color on the website.

accent-shades.title: Edit Accent Shades
accent-shades.description: Adjust each shade’s HSL values. Higher values provide more saturation/lightness and lower values provide less. Don't adjust the hue unless you know exactly what you're doing.

accent-hover.title: Hover
accent-hover.tooltip: Set hover lightness as a multiple (e.g. "1.15" for 15% lighter)

base.title: Base
base.tooltip: Typically the darkest color for the website (used for text and dark backgrounds).

base-shades.title: Edit Base Shades
base-shades.description: Adjust each shade’s HSL values. Higher values provide more saturation/lightness and lower values provide less. Don't adjust the hue unless you know exactly what you're doing.

base-hover.title: Hover
base-hover.tooltip: Set hover lightness as a multiple (e.g. "1.15" for 15% lighter)

shade.title: Shade
shade.tooltip: Default black base. Adjust if you want to slightly change its hue. Adjustments won't effect "white" or "black" classes.

shade-shades.title: Edit Shades
shade-shades.description: Adjust each shade’s HSL values. Higher values provide more saturation/lightness and lower values provide less. Don't adjust the hue unless you know exactly what you're doing.

shade-hover.title: Hover
shade-hover.tooltip: Set hover lightness as a multiple (e.g. "1.15" for 15% lighter)

contextual-colors.title: Contextual Colors
contextual-colors.tooltip: Set the contextual colors for your website.

success-hover.title: Success Hover
success-hover.tooltip: Set hover lightness as a multiple (e.g. "1.15" for 15% lighter)

danger-hover.title: Danger Hover
danger-hover.tooltip: Set hover lightness as a multiple (e.g. "1.15" for 15% lighter)

warning-hover.title: Warning Hover
warning-hover.tooltip: Set hover lightness as a multiple (e.g. "1.15" for 15% lighter)

info-hover.title: Info Hover
info-hover.tooltip: Set hover lightness as a multiple (e.g. "1.15" for 15% lighter)

base-size.title: Base Heading Size
base-size.tooltip: Set the base min & max values for fluid headings.

heading-scale.title: Desktop Scale
heading-scale.tooltip: The degree of change between heading sizes on desktop.

heading-scale-custom.title: Custom Desktop Scale
heading-scale-custom.tooltip: Set your own mathematical desktop scale value.

mob-heading-scale.title: Mobile Scale
mob-heading-scale.tooltip: The degree of change between heading sizes on mobile.

mob-heading-scale-custom.title: Custom Mobile Scale
mob-heading-scale-custom.tooltip: Set your own mathematical mobile scale value.

heading-colors.title: Heading Colors
heading-colors.description: Set default colors for each heading level using an ACSS variable. NOTE: ACSS does not set heading colors by default. The following fields only have placeholders.

heading-line-heights.title: Heading Line Heights
heading-line-heights.description: Set the line height for each heading size.

heading-line-lengths.title: Heading Line Lengths
heading-line-lengths.description: Set the heading line length to a specific number of characters for maximum readability. The recommended value is anywhere from 45ch to 80ch.

heading-overrides-accordion.title: Heading Size Overrides
heading-overrides-accordion.description: Set any heading size manually. The first input is the mobile value and the second input is the desktop value. You can choose to leave the mobile input blank and only change the desktop value if you'd like. All sizes will remain responsive according to the values you set.

h1-min.title: H1 Text Size (Mobile)
h1-min.tooltip: Input the smallest size H1 headings to be on mobile devices.

h1-max.title: H1 Text Size (Desktop)
h1-max.tooltip: Input the largest size H1 headings to be on desktop devices.

h2-min.title: H2 Text Size (Mobile)
h2-min.tooltip: Input the smallest size you want H2 headings to be on mobile devices.

h2-max.title: H2 Text Size (Desktop)
h2-max.tooltip: Input the largest size you want H2 headings to be on desktop devices.

h3-min.title: H3 Text Size (Mobile)
h3-min.tooltip: Input the smallest size you want H3 headings to be on mobile devices.

h3-max.title: H3 Text Size (Desktop)
h3-max.tooltip: Input the largest size you want H3 headings to be on desktop devices.

h4-min.title: H4 Text Size (Mobile)
h4-min.tooltip: Input the smallest size you want H4 headings to be on mobile devices.

h4-max.title: H4 Text Size (Desktop)
h4-max.tooltip: Input the largest size you want H4 headings to be on desktop devices.

h5-min.title: H5 Text Size (Mobile)
h5-min.tooltip: Input the smallest size you want H5 headings to be on mobile devices.

h5-max.title: H5 Text Size (Desktop)
h5-max.tooltip: Input the largest size you want H5 headings to be on desktop devices.

h6-min.title: H6 Text Size (Mobile)
h6-min.tooltip: Input the smallest size you want H6 headings to be on mobile devices.

h6-max.title: H6 Text Size (Desktop)
h6-max.tooltip: Input the largest size you want H6 headings to be on desktop devices.

option-balance-headings.title: Automatically Balance Headings
option-balance-headings.tooltip: Prevent orphans in headings (in supported browsers).

body-color.title: Default Text Color
body-color.tooltip: Set the default body text color for your website (ACSS variable recommended).

base-size.title: Base Text Size
base-size.tooltip: Set the base min & max values for fluid text.

text-scale.title: Desktop Scale
text-scale.tooltip: The degree of change between text sizes on desktop.

text-scale-custom.title: Custom Desktop Scale
text-scale-custom.tooltip: Set your own mathematical desktop scale value.

mob-text-scale.title: Mobile Scale
mob-text-scale.tooltip: The degree of change between text sizes on mobile.

mob-text-scale-custom.title: Custom Mobile Scale
mob-text-scale-custom.tooltip: Set your own mathematical mobile scale value.

text-line-heights.title: Text Line Heights
text-line-heights.description: Set the line height for each text size.

text-line-lengths.title: Text Line Lengths
text-line-lengths.description: Set the text line length to a specific number of characters for maximum readability. The recommended value is anywhere from 45ch to 80ch. This setting only affects paragraphs and lists, but can affect containers when a text size class is applied at the container level.

text-overrides-accordion.title: Text Size Overrides
text-overrides-accordion.description: Set any text size manually. The first input is the mobile value and the second input is the desktop value. You can choose to leave the mobile input blank and only change the desktop value if you'd like. All sizes will remain responsive according to the values you set.

text-xxl-min.title: "XXL" Text Size (Mobile)
text-xxl-min.tooltip: Input the smallest size you want "XXL" text to be on mobile devices.

text-xxl-max.title: "XXL" Text Size (Desktop)
text-xxl-max.tooltip: Input the largest size you want "XXL" text to be on desktop devices.

text-xl-min.title: "XL" Text Size (Mobile)
text-xl-min.tooltip: Input the smallest size you want "XL" text to be on mobile devices.

text-xl-max.title: "XL" Text Size (Desktop)
text-xl-max.tooltip: Input the largest size you want "XL" text to be on desktop devices.

text-l-min.title: "L" Text Size (Mobile)
text-l-min.tooltip: Input the smallest size you want "L" text to be on mobile devices.

text-l-max.title: "L" Text Size (Desktop)
text-l-max.tooltip: Input the largest size you want "L" text to be on desktop devices.

text-m-min.title: "M" Text Size (Mobile)
text-m-min.tooltip: Input the smallest size you want "M" text to be on mobile devices.

text-m-max.title: "M" Text Size (Desktop)
text-m-max.tooltip: Input the largest size you want "M" text to be on desktop devices.

text-s-min.title: "S" Text Size (Mobile)
text-s-min.tooltip: Input the smallest size you want "S" text to be on mobile devices.

text-s-max.title: "S" Text Size (Desktop)
text-s-max.tooltip: Input the largest size you want "S" text to be on desktop devices.

text-xs-min.title: "S" Text Size (Mobile)
text-xs-min.tooltip: Input the smallest size you want "XS" text to be on mobile devices.

text-xs-max.title: "S" Text Size (Desktop)
text-xs-max.tooltip: Input the largest size you want "XS" text to be on desktop devices.

option-balance-text.title: Automatically Balance Text
option-balance-text.tooltip: Prevent orphans in pargraphs, lists, and quotes (in supported browsers).

typography-spacing.title: Typography Spacing
typography-spacing.description: Make your typography spacing more consistent and automatic.

option-paragraph-fix.title: Smart Spacing
option-paragraph-fix.tooltip: Resets user-agent typography spacing and applies smart gap spacing to typography.

default-heading-spacing.title: Heading Spacing
default-heading-spacing.tooltip: Set the top margin value for adjacent sibling headings.

default-paragraph-spacing.title: Paragraph Spacing
default-paragraph-spacing.tooltip: Set the top margin value for adjacent sibling paragraphs.

default-list-spacing.title: List Spacing
default-list-spacing.tooltip: Set the top margin value for adjacent sibling lists (ul, ol).

default-list-item-spacing.title: List Item Spacing
default-list-item-spacing.tooltip: Set the top margin value for adjacent sibling list items (li).

multiplier-values.title: Text Larger
multiplier-values.tooltip: Sets a min and max for the 'text--larger' class

text-size-fallbacks.title: Fallbacks
text-size-fallbacks.tooltip: Controls text & heading sizes on devices that don't support calc() or clamp().

main-spacing-system.title: Main Spacing
main-spacing-system.description: Set the base value for margin, padding, gaps, etc.

base-spacing.title: Base Spacing
base-spacing.tooltip: Set the min & max values for fluid margin, padding, and gaps.

space-scale.title: Desktop Scale
space-scale.tooltip: The degree of change between spacing sizes on desktop.

space-scale-custom.title: Custom Desktop Scale
space-scale-custom.tooltip: Set your own mathematical scale value.

mob-space-scale.title: Mobile Scale
mob-space-scale.tooltip: The degree of change between spacing sizes on mobile.

mob-space-scale-custom.title: Custom Mobile Scale
mob-space-scale-custom.tooltip: Set your own mathematical mobile scale value.

space-adjust-section.title: Base Multiplier (Desktop)
space-adjust-section.tooltip: Controls top & bottom section padding on desktop by multiplying Base Spacing.

mob-space-adjust-section.title: Base Multiplier (Mobile)
mob-space-adjust-section.tooltip: Controls top & bottom section padding at the minimum device size by multiplying Base Spacing.

left-right-padding.title: Inline Padding (Gutter)
left-right-padding.tooltip: Set the min & max values for fluid left & right section padding.

section-padding-x-min.title: Left/Right Section Padding (min)
section-padding-x-min.tooltip: Set a min value for responsive left/right section padding. This determines the distance between your content and the edge of the screen on laptops and mobile devices.

section-padding-x-max.title: Left/Right Section Padding (max)
section-padding-x-max.tooltip: Set a max value for responsive left/right section padding. This determines the distance between your content and the edge of the screen on laptops and mobile devices.

contextual-spacing.title: Contextual Spacing
contextual-spacing.description: Define standardized spacing for specific situations.

contextual-container-gap.title: Container Gap
contextual-container-gap.tooltip: The default value for spacing between containers in sections using .container-gap or var(--container-gap).

option-container-gap.title: Automatic Container Spacing
option-container-gap.tooltip: Automatically space containers in section using var(--container-gap).

contextual-content-gap.title: Content Gap
contextual-content-gap.tooltip: Default value for spacing between content using .content-gap or var(--content-gap).

option-content-gap.title: Automatic Content Spacing
option-content-gap.tooltip: Automatically space content in containers using var(--content-gap).

contextual-grid-gap.title: Grid Gap
contextual-grid-gap.tooltip: The default value for spacing between grid items using .grid-gap or var(--grid-gap).

option-grid-gap.title: Automatic Grid Spacing
option-grid-gap.tooltip: Automatically space grid items using var(--grid-gap).

option-btn-text-size.title: Custom Button Text Size
option-btn-text-size.tooltip: By default, button text inherits the "M" text size. Turn this setting on to set a custom text size for buttons.

btn-text.title: Text Size
btn-text.tooltip: Set a mobile font size (1st field) and desktop font size (2nd field).

btn-text-min.title: Font-Size (mobile)
btn-text-min.tooltip: Set a minimum value for responsive default text sizing on buttons.

btn-text-max.title: Font-Size (desktop)
btn-text-max.tooltip: Set a maximum value for responsive default text sizing on buttons.

button-padding.title: Button Padding
button-padding.tooltip: Set top/bottom & left/right button padding. Accepts any units ("em" recommended).

btn-pad-y.title: Top/Bottom Button Padding
btn-pad-y.tooltip: Adjust the vertical padding on buttons.

btn-pad-x.title: Left/Right Button Padding
btn-pad-x.tooltip: Adjust the horizontal padding on buttons.

btn-width.title: Minimum Button Width
btn-width.tooltip: Buttons won't be narrower than this width. Note: Can cause horizontal scrolling issues if value is too large.

btn-radius.title: Button Radius
btn-radius.tooltip: Use an ACSS radius variable or any value with a unit ("em" recommended).

link-underline-offset.title: Link Underline Offset
link-underline-offset.tooltip: Offset the underline style on underlined links (e.g. .25em)

option-action-btn.title: Load Action Button Styles
option-action-btn.tooltip: Turn Action button classes on or off.

option-primary-btn.title: Load Primary Button Styles
option-primary-btn.tooltip: Turn primary button classes on or off.

option-secondary-btn.title: Load Secondary Button Styles
option-secondary-btn.tooltip: Turn secondary button classes on or off.

option-accent-btn.title: Load Accent Button Styles
option-accent-btn.tooltip: Turn accent button classes on or off.

option-base-btn.title: Load Base Button Styles
option-base-btn.tooltip: Turn base button classes on or off.

option-black-btn.title: Load Black Button Styles
option-black-btn.tooltip: Turn black button classes on or off.

option-white-btn.title: Load White Button Styles
option-white-btn.tooltip: Turn white button classes on or off.

header-heights.title: Header Heights
header-heights.description: Set your header height (per breakpoint). Used for var(--header-height), automatic sticky offset, and automatic scroll offset.

option-offset-page-content.title: Offset Page Content Automatically
option-offset-page-content.tooltip: Offset your page content to account for the height of your header. Note: Header height values must be filled out above - only use when header is positioned Absolute or Fixed).

scroll-styling.title: Scroll Styling
scroll-styling.tooltip: Set your scroll margins (per breakpoint). These are used for scroll offset and sticky offset.

scroll-margins.title: Scroll Offsets
scroll-margins.description: While header heights (above) are used for scroll offset, you can choose to set an additional offset value to increase the offset.

scroll-margin-l.title: Scroll Offset (L)
scroll-margin-l.tooltip: Set an offset at the 'L' breakpoint.

scroll-margin-m.title: Scroll Offset (M)
scroll-margin-m.tooltip: Set an offset at the 'M' breakpoint.

scroll-margin-s.title: Scroll Offset (S)
scroll-margin-s.tooltip: Set an offset at the 'S' breakpoint.

sticky.title: Sticky Settings
sticky.tooltip: Adjust the distance from top for sticky elements. Accepts values with units, calcs, or variables. See documentation

option-sticky-offset.title: Offset Sticky Elements Automatically
option-sticky-offset.tooltip: Use scroll offsets and header heights for sticky elements?

manual-sticky-offsets.title: Manual Sticky Offsets
manual-sticky-offsets.description: If you don't use auto-offset, you can set manual offsets for your sticky offset classes.

box-shadow-1.title: Box Shadow 1
box-shadow-1.description: Warning: Setting these values will replace .box-shadow--m and var(--box-shadow-m) with a custom name and value.

box-shadow-1-name.title: Box Shadow 1 Name
box-shadow-1-name.tooltip: Replace the extension with a custom name (e.g. 'primary' will create .box-shadow--primary and var(--box-shadow-primary)).

box-shadow-1-value.title: Box Shadow 1 Value
box-shadow-1-value.tooltip: Supports any valid box shadow value, including multi-layer box shadows and inset shadows.

box-shadow-2.title: Box Shadow 2
box-shadow-2.description: Warning: Setting these values will replace .box-shadow--l and var(--box-shadow-l) with a custom name and value.

box-shadow-2-name.title: Box Shadow 2 Name
box-shadow-2-name.tooltip: Replace the extension with a custom name (e.g. 'primary' will create .box-shadow--primary and var(--box-shadow-primary)).

box-shadow-2-value.title: Box Shadow 2 Value
box-shadow-2-value.tooltip: Supports any valid box shadow value, including multi-layer box shadows and inset shadows.

box-shadow-3.title: Box Shadow 3
box-shadow-3.description: Warning: Setting these values will replace .box-shadow--xl and var(--box-shadow-xl) with a custom name and value.

box-shadow-3-name.title: Box Shadow 3 Name
box-shadow-3-name.tooltip: Replace the extension with a custom name (e.g. 'primary' will create .box-shadow--primary and var(--box-shadow-primary)).

box-shadow-3-value.title: Box Shadow 3 Value
box-shadow-3-value.tooltip: Supports any valid box shadow value, including multi-layer box shadows and inset shadows.

Selection.title: Selection Styling
Selection.tooltip: Customize your website's selection text (cursor highlighting).

selection-bg.title: Selection Background
selection-bg.tooltip: Sets the default selection background color for your website.

selection-text.title: Selection Text Color
selection-text.tooltip: Sets the default selection text color for your website.

selection-bg-alt.title: Alt Selection Background
selection-bg-alt.tooltip: Sets the background color value for .selection--alt class.

selection-text-alt.title: Alt Selection Text Color
selection-text-alt.tooltip: Sets the text color value for .selection--alt class.

base-radius.title: Base Radius
base-radius.tooltip: Set the base radius for classes (.rounded) and variables (--radius).

radius-scale.title: Radius Scale
radius-scale.tooltip: Controls the degree of change between radius sizes.

columns.title: Columns
columns.tooltip: Adjust the width of columns and column rulers. See documentation

column-widths.title: Column Widths
column-widths.description: Adjust the widths of text columns (.col-width classes).

columns-rule-widths.title: Column Rule Widths
columns-rule-widths.description: Adjust the width of text column rulers (vertical dividers).

plugin.title: Options
plugin.description: Set the options for the Automatic.css plugin

option-reduce-motion.title: Reduce Motion
option-reduce-motion.tooltip: Reduce motion and animations for user that prefer reduced motion (important for accessibility).

option-smooth-scrolling.title: Enable CSS Smooth Scrolling
option-smooth-scrolling.tooltip: You can set an offset under 'Additional Styling' > Header Styling.

option-builder-input-validation.title: Variable expansion & validation
option-builder-input-validation.tooltip:
Auto-expands variables and calc functions while validating and fixing broken values.
Read more

option-contextual-menus-enable.title: Contextual Menus (Classes/Variables)
option-contextual-menus-enable.tooltip:
Adds context menus for inserting classes and variables.
Read more

option-keyboard-nav-hover-preview-enable.title: Style Preview & Keyboard Enhancement
option-keyboard-nav-hover-preview-enable.tooltip:
Hit Tab to select and preview a class or hover over a class for live preview. While tabbed, you can start typing to instantly add/remove characters to the selected class name.
Read more

option-bricks-color-swatches-checkerboar.title: Enhance Transparent Color Swatches (Bricks)
option-bricks-color-swatches-checkerboar.tooltip:
Adds a checkerboard background to the Bricks color swatches to better distinguish transparent colors.
Read more

option-gutenberg-load-styling-backend.title: Load ACSS stylesheets in the block editor
option-gutenberg-load-styling-backend.tooltip: Allows you to style content in the block editor with Automatic.css classes.

option-gutenberg-color-palette-generate.title: Generate Gutenberg Color Palette
option-gutenberg-color-palette-generate.tooltip: Add the Automatic.css colors in the Gutenberg palette.

option-gutenberg-color-palette-replace.title: Replace Gutenberg Color Palette
option-gutenberg-color-palette-replace.tooltip: Replace the default Gutenberg color palette with the Automatic.css colors.

option-move-gutenberg-css-input.title: Class-First Workflow
option-move-gutenberg-css-input.tooltip: Moves the input for custom CSS classes to the top of the Block settings panel.

group-pro-mode.title: Pro Mode
group-pro-mode.tooltip: Disables non-critical classes while retaining the variables for users who mostly use custom classes. Pro Mode makes ACSS about 50% lighter.

option-position.title: Position Classes
option-position.tooltip: Turn off position-- classes and sticky-- classes.

option-grid.title: Grid Classes
option-grid.tooltip: Turn off grid--, .col-span--, row-span--, col-start--, & row-start-- classes.

option-flex.title: Flexbox Classes
option-flex.tooltip: Turn off flex--, align--, & justify-- classes.

option-columns.title: Column Classes
option-columns.tooltip: Turn off col-count--, col-width--, col-gap-- classes.

option-deprecated.title: Load Deprecated Styles
option-deprecated.tooltip: Will load all deprecated ACSS framework modules.

admin-bar-enabled.title: Admin Bar Link
admin-bar-enabled.tooltip: Add a link to the settings page in the admin bar.

admin-link-position.title: Admin Link Position
admin-link-position.tooltip: Set the position of the admin link. See documentation

delete-on-deactivation.title: Delete on deactivation
delete-on-deactivation.tooltip: Type "yes" if we should delete the plugin's options when you deactivate the plugin.

frames.title: Frames
frames.description:
Set global styling for Frames components.
Note: A Frames membership is required.

fr-hero-padding.title: Hero Padding
fr-hero-padding.tooltip: Default value for top/bottom hero padding.

fr-lede-width.title: Lede Width
fr-lede-width.tooltip: The max-width (in characters) of lede paragraphs, blurbs, etc.

fr-card-gap.title: Card Element Gap
fr-card-gap.tooltip: Controls default spacing between elements in cards.

option-bricks-gallery-thumb-size.title: Adjust Template Thumbnail Size
option-bricks-gallery-thumb-size.tooltip: Sets the aspect ratio for thumbnails in the template library to 4/3 so you can see more of each frame.

forms.title: Form Styling
forms.description:
Set global styling for forms using .form--light and .form--dark.
Support for: Bricks (native forms) & WSForm.

option-forms.title: Load Form Styling
option-forms.tooltip: Required for styling forms with ACSS.

form-default-labels.title: Label Styling
form-default-labels.description: Style your form labels (text above the inputs).

form-default-legends.title: Legend Styling
form-default-legends.description: Style your form legends (fieldset captions) - Learn More

form-default-helps.title: Help Styling
form-default-helps.description: Style your form help text (text below the inputs)

form-default-fields.title: Field & Fieldset Styling
form-default-fields.description: Style your fields & fieldsets - Learn More

f-fieldset-margin-bottom.title: Fieldset Bottom Margin
f-fieldset-margin-bottom.tooltip: Set the vertical space between input groups.

f-field-margin-bottom.title: Field Bottom Margin
f-field-margin-bottom.tooltip: Set the vertical space between inputs.

f-grid-gutter.title: Grid Gutter
f-grid-gutter.tooltip: Set the distance between form elements.

f-input-height.title: Height
f-input-height.tooltip: Setting a height on inputs creates visual consistency.

f-input-padding-y.title: Top/Bottom Input Padding
f-input-padding-y.tooltip: Adjust the vertical padding on inputs.

f-input-padding-x.title: Left/Right Input Padding
f-input-padding-x.tooltip: Adjust the horizontal padding on inputs.

form-default-main-button.title: Global & Submit Button Styling
form-default-main-button.description: Applies to the submit button while also creating some shared styles for secondary buttons.

f-btn-padding-y.title: Top/Bottom Button Padding
f-btn-padding-y.tooltip: Adjust the vertical padding on inputs.

f-btn-padding-x.title: Left/Right Button Padding
f-btn-padding-x.tooltip: Adjust the horizontal padding on inputs.

form-default-radio-buttons.title: Option Input Styling
form-default-radio-buttons.description: Style your radio and checkbox inputs. Learn More

f-tab-padding-y.title: Top/Bottom Tab Padding
f-tab-padding-y.tooltip: Adjust the vertical padding on tabs.

f-tab-padding-x.title: Left/Right Tab Padding
f-tab-padding-x.tooltip: Adjust the horizontal padding on tabs.

f-tab-active-border-bottom-size.title: Active Bottom Border Size
f-tab-active-border-bottom-size.tooltip: Certain tab designs call for controlling the bottom border size.

f-tab-group-padding-y.title: Top/Bottom Tab Group Padding
f-tab-group-padding-y.tooltip: Adjust the vertical padding on tabs.

f-tab-group-padding-x.title: Left/Right Tab Group Padding
f-tab-group-padding-x.tooltip: Adjust the horizontal padding on tabs.

form-light-styling.title: Form Light Styles
form-light-styling.tooltip: Style forms that appear on a light background or via a light theme. Applies to the .form--light class.

form-light-labels.title: Label Styling
form-light-labels.description: Style your form labels (text above the inputs).

form-light-legends.title: Legend Styling
form-light-legends.description: Style your form legends (fieldset captions) - Learn More

form-light-helps.title: Help Styling
form-light-helps.description: Style your form help text (text below the inputs)

form-light-main-button.title: Global & Submit Button Styling
form-light-main-button.description: Applies to the submit button while also creating some shared styles for secondary buttons.

form-light-secondary-buttons.title: Secondary Button Styling
form-light-secondary-buttons.description:
Change the color of your secondary form buttons.
All other styles are shared with the primary submit style.

form-light-radio-buttons.title: Option Input Styling
form-light-radio-buttons.description: Style your radio and checkbox inputs. Learn More

f-light-progress-background-color.title: Background Color (Light)
f-light-progress-background-color.tooltip: The background/container color of your progress bar.

f-light-progress-bar-fill-color.title: Fill Color (Light)
f-light-progress-bar-fill-color.tooltip: The color of the actual progress meter.

f-light-tab-background-color.title: Background Color (Light)
f-light-tab-background-color.tooltip: The color of a tab when it's not selected.

f-light-tab-active-background-color.title: Active Background Color (Light)
f-light-tab-active-background-color.tooltip: The color of a selected tab.

f-light-tab-border-bottom-color.title: Border Bottom Color (Light)
f-light-tab-border-bottom-color.tooltip: Certain tab designs call for controlling the bottom border color.

form-light-range-slider.title: Range Slider Styling
form-light-range-slider.description: Style your range sliders. Note: to customize the color of the lower and upper track you need to enable it in Range Slider's Field Settings

f-light-range-left-track-color.title: Left Track Color (Light)
f-light-range-left-track-color.tooltip: Background color of the left track (before the thumb)

f-light-range-right-track-color.title: Right Track Color (Light)
f-light-range-right-track-color.tooltip: Background color of the right track (after the thumb)

form-dark-styling.title: Form Dark Styles
form-dark-styling.tooltip: Style forms that appear on a dark background or via a dark theme. Applies to the .form--dark class.

form-dark-labels.title: Label Styling
form-dark-labels.description: Style your form labels (text above the inputs).

form-dark-legends.title: Legend Styling
form-dark-legends.description: Style your form legends (fieldset captions) - Learn More

form-dark-helps.title: Help Styling
form-dark-helps.description: Style your form help text (text below the inputs)

form-dark-main-button.title: Global & Submit Button Styling
form-dark-main-button.description: Applies to the submit button while also creating some shared styles for secondary buttons.

form-dark-secondary-buttons.title: Secondary Button Styling
form-dark-secondary-buttons.description:
Change the color of your secondary form buttons.
All other styles are shared with the primary submit style.

form-dark-radio-buttons.title: Option Input Styling
form-dark-radio-buttons.description: Style your radio and checkbox inputs. Learn More

f-dark-progress-background-color.title: Background Color (Dark)
f-dark-progress-background-color.tooltip: The background/container color of your progress bar.

f-dark-progress-bar-fill-color.title: Fill Color (Dark)
f-dark-progress-bar-fill-color.tooltip: The color of the actual progress meter.

f-dark-tab-background-color.title: Background Color (Dark)
f-dark-tab-background-color.tooltip: The color of a tab when it's not selected.

f-dark-tab-active-background-color.title: Active Background Color (Dark)
f-dark-tab-active-background-color.tooltip: The color of a selected tab.

f-dark-tab-border-bottom-color.title: Border Bottom Color (Dark)
f-dark-tab-border-bottom-color.tooltip: Certain tab designs call for controlling the bottom border color.

form-dark-range-slider.title: Range Slider Styling
form-dark-range-slider.description: Style your range sliders. Note: to customize the color of the lower and upper track you need to enable it in Range Slider's Field Settings

f-dark-range-left-track-color.title: Left Track Color (Dark)
f-dark-range-left-track-color.tooltip: Background color of the left track (before the thumb)

f-dark-range-right-track-color.title: Right Track Color (Dark)
f-dark-range-right-track-color.tooltip: Background color of the right track (after the thumb)

setup-guide.title: Setup Guide
setup-guide.description: Automatic.css is fundamentally different from other utility class systems. This is precisely what makes it so powerful and preferential. Before trying to use the system, it's important that you understand how it works. You'll find all documentation, setup steps, tips, tricks, and support in the private Automatic.css Community (license required).

style-guide-oxy.title: Style Guide (Oxygen)
style-guide-oxy.description: To install the official ACSS UI Style Guide in Oxygen, click the Oxygen design set key to copy it and then follow our UI Style Guide installation instructions

design-set-key.title: Design Set Key
design-set-key.tooltip: Click to copy the key for the Oxygen design set

style-guide-bricks.title: Style Guide (Bricks)
style-guide-bricks.description: To install the official ACSS UI Style Guide in Bricks Builder, copy the remote template URL below and follow these instructions.

design-set-key-bricks.title: Remote Template URL
design-set-key-bricks.tooltip: Click to copy the remote template URL for the Bricks Style Guide
